name: Prizm Media Inc.
address: Prizm Media Inc., 8838 Heather St #101, Vancouver, BC V6P 3S8

featured_reviews.review_id: We have been working with Prizm Media  for over 15 years. As consultant, we can vouch that the company has been operating with professionalism, integrity and following the highest standards of ethics. The Prizm Media Team has been very helpful, responsive and professional whenever we require their assistance. Their services have effectively helped healthcare providers to grow in multiple areas; especially revenue growth and environmental impact. This has been validated by many awards that the company has achieved past few years. We are grateful to have the opportunity to work with Prizm Media.

featured_reviews.review_id: I've been working with Prizm Media for over 6 years now and have to say they are one of my favorite business partners in the patient acquisition/lead generation space. They stand out because for anyone who's been in this industry, you come across a handful of less than ethical and professional companies, and Prizm is the opposite of that. They have very high standards in dealing with both their clients/customers and vendors; it's no surprise most of their clients and vendors have been longstanding partners of theirs for years. I highly recommend Prizm Media for your patient acquisition and lead generation needs.

featured_reviews.review_id: Prizm Media is one of the best Lead Generation Companies to work with. We are doing business since past 12 years. We strongly value the partnership. Their team is always available to work closely and make sure about their vendors and clients satisfaction.

featured_reviews.review_id:
We are associated with Prizm since 2015. Working with Prizm has been one of the best experiences that I've had throughout my career within this industry. The Prizm team have always been very supportive, responsive and very much helpful. They have played a major role in our growth in this industry and to add to it, their payments are always on time.
They have always been a lot more than Business Partners!!!

featured_reviews.review_id:
One of the longest business relations we had is with Prizm media for obvious reasons, like everyone is very warm, supportive and approachable, very significantly would like to mention the timely payments and recognition's.
Very professional management and administration, they deliver with immaculate quality standards, we learned a lot during the tenure of our collaboration with Prizm Media.

featured_reviews.review_id:
I have been collaborated with Prizm Media for almost ten years, and have experienced personal and professional growth. Prizm Media has provided tremendous opportunities for my company to flourish.
They maintain high standards when dealing with clients and customers, validated with awards that the company has achieved, not to mention prompt payments and splendid teamwork. I have successfully run so many campaigns with them over the period of ten years which itself speaks volumes.

featured_reviews.review_id: Prizm Media provided excellent opportunities for my company to grow substantially. Revenue growth was over 270% during the five years we utilized their expertise. They provided outstanding service and always conducted business in the highest integrity. I am impressed with the employees and have had pleasant interactions during this time . Highly recommended.
featured_reviews.review_text: Prizm Media provided excellent opportunities for my company to grow substantially. Revenue growth was over 270% during the five years we utilized their expertise. They provided outstanding service and always conducted business in the highest integrity. I am impressed with the employees and have had pleasant interactions during this time . Highly recommended.

featured_reviews.review_id: The consultancy that this company offers along with their services is invaluable. They don't sugar-coat results, they provide historical data that allow any serious business person to understand the growth potential while keeping in mind the responsibility it carries in achieving final results. They behave as a partner from the start. I would recommend Prizm to anyone looking for a long term, reliable, and honest partner.
